  {
    "problem": "Users with Lack of expertise problem and want Offering specialized courses focused on specific topics",
    "importance": 5,
    "required_expertise": 1,
    "no_code_solution": "Create an online platform using no-code tools like Bubble or Webflow to host and sell the courses.",
    "content_solution": "Create video-based courses or eBook guides that can be sold on platforms like Udemy or Gumroad.",
    "competitors": "Coursera, Udemy, Skillshare",
    "differentiator": "Offer a more personalized learning experience with smaller class sizes and one-on-one interaction with the instructor."
